name: Psynth
description: Psynth is an AI-powered software that transforms patient test results, intake data, and clinical observations into accurate, top-quality diagnostic reports for psychologists in minutes.
longDescription: Psynth is a specialized AI tool designed to automate the creation of psychological diagnostic reports, allowing psychologists to upload various forms of patient data and receive draft reports quickly. Its mission is to free clinicians from time-consuming clerical tasks, enabling them to focus on deeper patient analysis and care. By addressing the bottleneck of report writing, Psynth helps practices grow and improve efficiency. The software processes unstructured data like PDFs, images, and handwritten notes without requiring formatting. It ensures reports are based on validated best practices and includes quality checks for accuracy. Overall, Psynth solves the problem of lengthy report preparation, reducing it from hours to minutes while maintaining high standards.
features: Users can upload any documentation as-is, including PDFs, images, and handwritten notes, which Psynth processes without needing specific formatting, supporting over 250 assessments for comprehensive compatibility.
Psynth generates a complete draft report in minutes based on the uploaded data, significantly reducing the time traditionally spent on report writing.

The AI produces reports built on validated, up-to-date best practices, featuring clear descriptions, data visualizations for patient understanding, and automatic quality control checks to flag inconsistencies or missing information.

Reports can be easily customized by editing sections with AI-assisted prompts or manual input, allowing real-time formatting and tailoring to the user's voice, preferences, and clinical needs before exporting to PDF or Word.
The AI surfaces patterns and connections in data that might be missed, providing evidence-based findings and explanations to enhance diagnostic confidence and enable nuanced analysis.
Psynth ensures best-in-class patient data protection with HIPAA compliance, a streamlined BAA process, and a zero retention model for ethical data privacy.
The software allows users to add new assessments as needed, expanding its utility beyond the initial 250+ supported ones.
Real-time revisions and AI assistance make it simple to refine reports, saving clinicians time on administrative tasks.
Data visualizations integrated into reports help communicate complex findings clearly to patients and colleagues.
Automated flagging of inconsistencies ensures higher accuracy and reliability in final reports.

faqs.question: What is Psynth?
faqs.answer: Psynth is an AI-powered software that converts patient test results, intake data, and clinical observations into high-quality diagnostic reports for psychologists to review and finalize.

faqs.question: How does Psynth work?
faqs.answer: Users upload documentation such as PDFs, images, or notes; the AI processes the data, generates a draft report in minutes, and allows for review, customization, and export.

faqs.question: Is Psynth HIPAA compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes, Psynth offers best-in-class patient data protection with HIPAA practices, a streamlined BAA process, and a zero retention model to ensure ethical data privacy.

faqs.question: What types of documents can I upload to Psynth?
faqs.answer: You can upload any documentation as-is, including PDFs, images, and even handwritten notes, without needing to format them beforehand.

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate a report with Psynth?
faqs.answer: Psynth generates a draft report in minutes, compared to the hours it typically takes manually.

faqs.question: Can I customize the reports generated by Psynth?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can edit any section using AI-assisted prompts or manual input, with real-time formatting to match your style and needs.

faqs.question: What assessments does Psynth support?
faqs.answer: Psynth supports over 250 assessments, and you can add others as needed for flexibility.

faqs.question: How secure is my patient data with Psynth?
faqs.answer: Psynth guarantees secure handling with HIPAA compliance and no data retention, prioritizing ethical practices.

faqs.question: Does Psynth help with diagnostic accuracy?
faqs.answer: Yes, the AI surfaces patterns, provides evidence-based findings, and runs quality checks to flag issues, enhancing confidence in diagnoses.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial for Psynth?
faqs.answer: The website does not mention a free trial; instead, you can book a demo to see it in action.

faqs.question: Can Psynth match my personal reporting style?
faqs.answer: Yes, the generated reports can be customized to align with your conclusions, explanations, and preferred format.

faqs.question: What if I need to add a new assessment not currently supported?
faqs.answer: Psynth allows you to add new assessments as needed, ensuring it adapts to your practice.
